9 December 2020

My Daily Driver

For the last 9 months, pretty much every morning I have brewed coffee for myself and my girlfriend using a V60. My brew method is based on James Hoffman’s ultimate V60 technique.

  • Hario V60 Scale
  • Hario Ceramic V60 Dripper
  • Knock Aergrind Hand Grinder
